entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • MacCatalyst project fails to build with clang++ error after migrating to .NET 8 #18741
  • [testing] Move the device test for ShowsKeyboardOnFocus to Appium #18740
    .NET 8 SR1
  • [WinUI 3] MAUI Grid should be a native Grid #18738
  • [iOS] Permissions.RequestAsync<Permissions.CalendarWrite><Permissions.CalendarRead> fails to return a value on iOS 16+ #18737
  • [Testing] Matrix tests need to be improved on Android #18735
    Backlog
  • [Testing] MauiCarouselRecyclerView occasionally fails when running Controls Device Tests #18733
    Backlog
  • Many compilation errors when building projects with the same root namespaces #18730
  • Cannot add email attachment on iOS in .NET Maui #18727
  • [Testing] Create UI Test for manual test D6 #18726
    .NET 8 SR2

Closed

  • Upgrading to 8.0.0-rc.2.9511 breaks the app. Loses references to MauiUIApplicationDelegate #18739
  • Button with ImageSource doesn't render correctly when initially hidden #18655
    .NET 8 SR1
  • [iOS] When setting ImageSource on a Button, LayoutOptions are completely ignored #18504
    .NET 8 SR1
  • Adding a Connectivity.ConnectivityChanged handler throw an exception on Android 14 #17861
    .NET 8 SR1
  • After Creating MAUI project #18724
  • Windows: CollectionView is flickering when an item is moved #17369
    .NET 8 SR1
  • Unable to deploy app with `Debug | x86 config`; must hardcode `RuntimeIdentifier` #14644

PullRequests

Created

  • Increase CA coverage in Core project #18736
  • Update to stable versions of .NET 8 #18732
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Remove invalid files from MauiImage #18731
    area/single project ☝️
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test D6 #18728
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, control-editor
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test D22 #18725
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, control-editor
  • Bump the androidx group with 16 updates #18723
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

Merged

  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #18722
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Only use custom image sizing with ImageButtons #18521
    area/controls 🎮
  • Fix broadcast receiver register on android 14.0/34+ #18520
    platform/android 🤖, area/essentials 🍞

Updated

  • [Android] Fix Flyout toolbar #18684
  • [Windows] Fix margin on title bar #17729
    platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, s/pr-needs-author-input, .NET 8 SR1
  • [Catalyst] Allow to use a custom WKUIDelegate on WebView #18483
    t/bug, platform/macOS 🍏, area/controls 🎮, control-webview, Under Consideration
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test D14 #18709
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test D13 #18710
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test D24 #18713
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, control-editor
  • Makes KeyboardAutoManager.GoToNextResponderOrResign public #18667
    community ✨
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test D11 #18676
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • Draw Line using BackgroundColor #17376
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, .NET 8 SR3
  • PanGesture notify Completed event moving outside View limits #15700
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/gestures, .NET 8 SR2
  • Fix Label Multilinetruncation (MaxLines / LineBreakMode) #14918
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-label, .NET 8 SR3
  • [Android] Allow full screen videos from WebView #15472
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-webview, Under Consideration
  • [Android] Fix Shadow issue related with screen rotation #15035
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, stale, Under Consideration
  • [Android] Allow to scroll horizontal WebView content inside TabbedPage #14320
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-webview, Under Consideration
  • [Android] Fix gif animation initial state #14295
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-image, stale, Under Consideration
  • [Android] Fix Button Ripple Effect not working #17821
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-button, .NET 8 SR1
  • [Android] Correctly clear text tapping the clear button on Entry #17543
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, Under Consideration
  • [Android] Fix default Switch Style #16252
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/templates 📄, area/controls 🎮, control-switch, stale, Under Consideration
  • Resizetizer issues fixes - nuget bumps #16100
    area/single project ☝️, stale, Under Consideration
  • Added TimePicker TimeSelected Event #18565
    do-not-merge, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-datetimepicker
  • [Testing] Added UI Test for manual test G1 #18616
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • Bump the windowsappsdk group with 3 updates #18606
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump the xunit group with 3 updates #18588
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [ios] fix memory leak in `TableView` #18718
    platform/iOS 🍎, memory-leak 💦, .NET 8 + Servicing
